insights: Model has high average error (MAE=11.21, RMSE=15.93)
MAPE of 2953% indicates large percentage errors
Negative mean residual (-6.33) shows consistent overprediction
Residuals follow normal distribution with no outliers
data.summary: The linear regression model shows significant prediction errors (MAPE=2953%) and consistent overprediction. While residuals are normally distributed, the high error metrics suggest the model may not be practically useful for crop yield forecasting without improvements in feature engineering or model selection.
data.task_answer: The linear regression model with lag features achieved MAE=11.21 for crop yield prediction. However, the extremely high MAPE (2953%) suggests predictions may not be practically useful. The model consistently overpredicts by ~6.33 units on average.
